sqlMap.select:
select fv.VALIDATION_ID, fv.VALIDATION_REGEX as FLD_VAL_VALIDATION_REGEX, fv.SECTION_NAME as FLD_VAL_SECTION_NAME, fv.SITE_NAME as FLD_VAL_SITE_NAME,
, , , ,
from FIELD_VALIDATION fv inner join FIELD_DEFINITION fd on fv.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION sfd on fv.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = sfd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_CONDITION fc on fv.VALIDATION_ID = fc.VALIDATION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION condFd on fc.DEPENDENT_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = condFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION secCondFd on fc.DEPENDENT_SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = secCondFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID
where ((fv.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) or (fv.SITE_NAME is NULL)) and fv.SECTION_NAME = #sectionName# and fv.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinitionId#
and fv.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinitionId#
and fv.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID is NULL
sqlMap.insert:
insert into FIELD_VALIDATION (VALIDATION_REGEX, SECTION_NAME, SITE_NAME, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID) values (#regex#, #sectionName#, #site.name#, #fieldDefinition.id#, #secondaryFieldDefinition.id#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update FIELD_VALIDATION set VALIDATION_REGEX = #regex#, SECTION_NAME = #sectionName#, SITE_NAME = #site.name#, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinition.id#, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinition.id# where VALIDATION_ID = #id#
